name: Limited Editon New Era Flat Caps
description:
South West Clothing Co are proud to present, for a short time only, a run of UK' Limited Edition New Era style flat caps.

We are only ever making 500 of each colour. Our first run is in classic black, with a beautiful embroided logo.

Our one size fits all is approx 58cm's in diameter.
Buy them quickly to avoid disappointment!
